promptPrefix:
Act as an email marketing specialist. 

Write a short, concise email reply back to the following marketing email reply in [TARGETLANGUAGE]:

  [PROMPT]

Make sure that reply includes:  

* The sender’s name with a pleasant professional greeting.
* Restating the sender’s comment or complaint to clarify understanding.
* A sympathetic response that either shows caring and understanding or offers a solution.
* A sign off asking if the sender is satisfied with the response.
* Call to action of what to do next.
* Placeholder for the Recipient’s name. Do not claim to be an email marketing specialist. Act as if you work at the company.
title: Marketing Email Reply
